Package task8

Class DoublyLinkedList<E>

java.lang.Object
task8.DoublyLinkedList<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of elements stored in the list.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<E>
public class DoublyLinkedList<E> extends Object implements Iterable<E>
The DoublyLinkedList represents a generic doubly linked list.
